posts.post_content:
The Clarkson Boston Batting Pose is Clarkson's scarcest variety. After many years I upgraded mine and am offering my old one for $750 delivered. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested. The card is guaranteed to grade with a number grade. Note: the dark area on the back image is a shadow. The stain on the front is a stain.

Thanks!
